moves.22. Rfb1: Gets more attacking pieces on the back row.
moves.22... Rad8: Have to add the bishops protection, and attack the queen.
moves.23. Qa3: Moves the queen, so I get a move.
moves.23... Bg5: Planing a attack on h2, pawn in front of the king.
moves.24... Qh4: Still plans attack on the pawn, and gets extra protection on the rook.
moves.26. Kg1: If you can tell me why he did that I would be happy.
moves.26... Be3+: Force him to go to h1.
moves.27... Qf1+: Can only move the night in between.
moves.28... Qxg1#: I took the night and CHECKMATE.
